content:
cfallin commented on issue #18:

Updated, thanks all for the feedback!

It seems discussion has mostly quiesced on this, or at least, there aren't really too many controversial things; we won't merge anything until next year at this point because of the holidays but if folks are happy with it, please do feel free to r+ and we can hopefully move forward in January :-)

cfallin commented on issue #18:

Greetings all -- after discussing once more in our Cranelift biweekly today, it seems that there are no major issues with the roadmap, and not much more to discuss, so I'd like to make a...

Motion to finalize with a disposition to merge

Stakeholders sign-off

cfallin commented on issue #18:

Now that we have signoffs from multiple separate groups, as per

Once any stakeholder from a different group has signed off, the RFC will move into a 10 calendar day final comment period (FCP), long enough to ensure that other stakeholders have at least a full business week to respond.

we are moving into the Final Comment Period. The FCP will end on Friday, February 4.

cfallin commented on issue #18:

Hi all -- the Final Comment Period has ended with no further objections or discussion, so we will now merge this RFC. Thanks, and here's to an exciting (remainder of) 2022 with all of these plans!
